        public List<DiscoveryNode> sortByMasterLikelihood(Iterable<DiscoveryNode> nodes)
        Returns the given nodes sorted by likelyhood of being elected as master, most likely first. Non-master nodes are not removed but are rather put in the end
        Parameters:
        nodes -
        Returns:

        Returns a list of the next possible masters.

      • electMaster

        public DiscoveryNode electMaster(Iterable<DiscoveryNode> nodes)
        Elects a new master out of the possible nodes, returning it. Returns null if no master has been elected.
